on_boarding_title_1: Transfer in any way that suits you
on_boarding_subtitle_1: Send money to anyone using a username, mobile number, or QR code—no account number needed.
on_boarding_subtitle_2: View your daily statistics and filter by week, month, or year to manage your expenses.
on_boarding_subtitle_3: Transfer your money within seconds using a username, phone number, or QR code, thanks to a system designed for instant and reliable responses.
login_hint: Log in to access all wallet features
